text: Brent Struyf (born 21 June 1995) is a Belgian korfball player. He is a member of Boeckenberg KC and the Belgium national korfball team. Struyf started playing with the Dutch club DVO in 2015. He moved back to Belgium in 2018. With the national team she won the silver medal at the 2022 World Games in Birmingham, Alabama. After the 2022 World Games, Hardies retired as an international korball player. He played a total of 42 games for the Belgian team. ==Achievements== ===Club=== *Topkorfbal League champion (indoor), 4x (2013, 2015, 2016, 2020) *, champion, 1x (2014) *, champion (outdoor), 2x (2013, 2014, 2015, 2016) ===National team=== ; World Games : 2017 World Games : 2022 World Games ; IKF World Korfball Championship : 2015 IKF World Korfball Championship : 2019 IKF World Korfball Championship ; European Korfball Championship : 2016 IKF European Korfball Championship : 4th 2018 IKF European Korfball A-Championship : 2021 IKF European Korfball A-Championship ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian korfball players
title: Brent Struyf
